rule.assert: Rule 9-1: A conformant document MUST NOT contain any element or attribute information item that has the namespace name https://docs.oasis-open.org/niemopen/ns/specification/conformanceTargets/6.0/, other than attribute {https://docs.oasis-open.org/niemopen/ns/specification/conformanceTargets/6.0/}conformanceTargets (CTAS Rule 3-3).
